content: "Scusa, Tom, non puoi arroccare perché il mio alfiere controlla lo scacco f1". "Non puoi spostarlo da qualche altra parte?"
translations: eng:Sorry, Tom, you can't castle because my bishop controls the f1 square. Can't you move it somewhere else﹖
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
